prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FoodieParadise
Title: The Ultimate Guide to Exotic Fruits: Durians, Mangosteens, and more!
Description: Embark on a culinary journey as we explore the flavors and health benefits of exotic fruits from around the world. This guide is a must-read for adventurous eaters and fruit enthusiasts!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceOdyssey
Title: Groundbreaking Discoveries about Dark Matter: Changing Our Understanding of the Universe
Description: Dive into the enigmatic world of dark matter with recent findings that are challenging our perception of the cosmos. Perfect for both the curious layman and the ardent astrophysicist!
yes i am interested in it

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AncientHistoryDigest
Title: Decoding the Mayan Script: A Historic Breakthrough 
Description: Step back in time with this in-depth analysis of the recently decoded Mayan script that alters our understanding of this ancient civilization. Ideal for history buffs, linguists, and those fascinated by mysteries of the past!

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenThumbGuru
Title: Perfecting Your Indoor Garden: Tips and Tricks for Apartment Plant Care 
Description: Learn how to nurture an urban jungle right in the comfort of your apartment. Our tips and tricks will guide you through the ins and outs of indoor plant care, from watering and lighting to pest prevention. Ideal for city dwellers, green enthusiasts, and those seeking to add a touch of nature to their living space.
tell me more about tips and the tricks for apartment plant care

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalPoliticsBuzz
Title: Balancing Power: A Deep Dive into the Intricacies of International Relations 
Description: An in-depth exploration of the dynamics of international politics, examining the balance of power, alliances, and negotiations. This article is designed for those interested in global affairs, political science, and conflict resolution. It offers compelling insights into the interconnectedness of nations and the impacts of geopolitical strategies.
yes i am interested in it

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MixedMediaMasterpieces 
Title: An Interdisciplinary Exploration: How Science, Art, and Philosophy Intersect in Modern Society 
Description: Dive into an enlightening discussion about the crosstalk among science, art, and philosophy in shaping our modern world. This article delves into how these seemingly disparate fields influence each other and provide surprising insights into our understanding of life. A must-read for those curious about the interplay of different disciplines and their impact on society.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoCurrencyInsider 
Title: Demystifying Blockchain: The Future of Digital Finance 
Description: Get to grips with the basics of Blockchain, cryptocurrencies and their impact on the global financial system. This beginner's guide will explore the potential of digital currencies, the technology behind them, and their potential role in the future of finance. Perfect for those who want to understand the buzz around Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: NanoTechBulletin
Title: The Microscopic World of Nanotechnology: A Revolution in Medicine, Energy, and More
Description: Enter the fascinating world of nanotechnology, with its potential to revolutionize fields ranging from medicine and energy to materials science. Learn about the latest advancements and understand how tiny tech could have a huge impact on our lives. This article is designed for tech enthusiasts, scientists, and anyone interested in groundbreaking innovations.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
